about_the_game:
Pack your suitcases, Italy awaits! When your uncle invites you to spend a wonderful vacation in Italy, you don't waste time! He, your family, and friends take you on a tour of the country's top historical sites. You get to know the beauty of ancient Pisa, explore the gladiatorial Colosseum in Rome and the wonderful Park of Monsters in Bomarzo, and admire the deep canals in Venice. You also get a chance to visit the archaeological sites of Pompeii and enjoy the Shakespearean romance of Verona. Not to mention the mesmerizing Blue Grotto and unexpected alpine vineyards. Relaxing and enlightening, this trip couldn't be more perfect!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔎 Wonderful Trip to Italy!
Enjoy a virtual tour full of hidden objects and stunning sights, bringing the spirit of Italy to life. Admire the architectural grandeur of ancient cities, and soak in the rich history and culture as you navigate through the game!

🔎 Explore Historical Wonders!
Visit the iconic Colosseum in Rome, uncover the mysteries of ancient Pompeii, glide through the romantic canals of Venice, and marvel at the Leaning Tower of Pisa. Each location is beautifully rendered, offering a realistic and educational experience.

🔎 Engaging Puzzles!
A variety of hidden objects and puzzles tailored to every taste will keep you entertained and challenged! From easy to difficult, each puzzle is designed to test your observation skills and provide a sense of accomplishment as you progress through the game.

🔎 Family-Friendly Fun!
Perfect for players of all ages, "Relaxing Time" offers wholesome entertainment that everyone can enjoy. Share the adventure with family and friends as you collectively explore Italy’s wonders and solve captivating puzzles together!
